cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on July 27, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4599, SUPER Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 128 (Wednesday, July 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GONZALEZ of Ohio:
H.R. 4599.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
To make all Laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into Execution the foregoing Powers, and all other
Powers vested by this Constitution in the Government of the
United States, or in any Department of Office thereof.
[Page H3803]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 161.

title: SUPER Act of 2021
